pr_title: Issue 1013 allow to restrict non supported docker images

timeline.message: (issue #1013) docker comp scan add analizer to be able to get OS version
(issue #1013) check that tool os version start with allowed os version, not contain
Allow to restrict "non-supported" docker images (#1013) - GUI part implemented

timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.bodyText:
You can use log formatting:
LOGGER.debug("Tool: {} version: {} ", tool.getId(), version) ...
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.bodyText: I see a lot of changes where null is added as argument to method updateToolVersionScanStatus. Maybe we should introduce overloaded method without osVersion argument  to reduce number of changes to the code?
timeline.author: mzueva
mzueva
mzueva

timeline.bodyText: No new line at the end of file
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.bodyText: I think it is not the best idea to have field isAllowed in this class, as it is not stored in DB and actually is mutated and set in runtime.
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.bodyText: I think we can get SystemPreference value and check os version at this point and remove isAllowed field from object itself.
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.message: (issue #1013) introduce View objects for Tool scan related objects
